title: What It Does
text: The Smart Healthcare System analyzes patient health data to predict the likelihood of developing specific diseases.

section.title: Why Our Application?
section.content: Our application is able to use machine learning models trained on historical data to enhance the informed dicision-making and efficient resouce allocatoin done by doctors in healthcare settings

section.title: How We Built It
section.content: We utilized a Flask backend that integrates machine learning models to process patient data and generate predictions. We then used react to create a user friendly frontend to our application
